markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scarab Cuirass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1243)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 10</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 1,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The cuirass of this _+1 [deathless  <%TREASURE%279%%> resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1238) [leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)_, stitched to resemble an Osiriani scarab beetle, feels strangely chitinous. You gain resistance 5 to [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1003" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _pest form_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Scarab Cuirass
